Biography

2017 (Game-by-Game): Masterson started two of his 11 appearances as a junior. He finished with a 4.15 ERA with 18 strikeouts in 17.1 innings pitchedâ€¦. Pitched a season-long three innings with a season-high five strikeouts at the Apprentice School in his first appearance of the year (2/25).

2016 (Game-by-Game): Masterson appeared on the mound eight times for the Golden Bears during his sophomore campaign, with four starts. He posted a 0-0 record with a career-best 3.12 ERA. In 17.1 innings pitched, he struck out 15 batters and held his opponents to a .294 batting average...Threw an inning of scoreless relief against Millersville (4/29).

2015 (Game-by-Game): Masterson pitched in nine games for the Golden Bears during his freshman season. He made four starts during the year and recorded two wins. He allowed no earned runs in four of his appearances. He pitched 20.2 innings and recorded 14 strikeouts with a 5.23 ERA...Threw a scoreless inning of relief against West Chester (3/23)...Pitched five innings with three strikeouts vs. Clarion (3/9)...Faced two batters and struck them both out in his collegiate debut (3/7).

Masterson's Single-Game Highs IP 5.0 vs. Clarion 3/9/2015 Ks 5 2x, last at Apprentice School 2/25/2017
